data.description: Perl Server Pages, mod_perl HTML embedding
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is an open-source implementation of the Perl Server
    Pages definition created by VelociGen in 2000. I use PSP heavily for
    my own Web site, and it is central to the code samples in my book,
    "Perl for the Web" (New Riders 2001). This module is being posted to
    CPAN to make it more accessible to readers who wish to use the
    examples, as well as anyone who wishes to embed Perl in HTML pages.

    Apache::PSP uses the Template::PSP module to compile PSP pages into
    bytecode instead of using the standard approach of interpreting
    embedded pages on the fly. This removes much of the performance hit
    found in embedded Perl.
